member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART
member.summary: Values that identify parts of the content of an arbitrary length data buffer.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_INPUT_SIGNATURE_BLOB
member.summary: The blob part is an input signature.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_OUTPUT_SIGNATURE_BLOB
member.summary: The blob part is an output signature.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_INPUT_AND_OUTPUT_SIGNATURE_BLOB
member.summary: The blob part is an input and output signature.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_PATCH_CONSTANT_SIGNATURE_BLOB
member.summary: The blob part is a patch constant signature.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_ALL_SIGNATURE_BLOB
member.summary: The blob part is all signature.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_DEBUG_INFO
member.summary: The blob part is debug information.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_LEGACY_SHADER
member.summary: The blob part is a legacy shader.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_XNA_PREPASS_SHADER
member.summary: The blob part is an XNA prepass shader.

member.name: D3D_BLOB_PART.D3D_BLOB_XNA_SHADER
member.summary: The blob part is an XNA shader.

summary.para: The blob part is program database (PDB) information.
summary.div: Note This value is supported by the D3dcompiler_44.dll or later version of the file.

summary.para: The blob part is private data.
summary.div: Note This value is supported by the D3dcompiler_44.dll or later version of the file.

summary.para: The blob part is a root signature. Refer to Specifying Root Signatures in HLSL for more information on using Direct3D12 with HLSL.
summary.div: Note This value is supported by the D3dcompiler_47.dll or later version of the file.

summary.para: The blob part is the debug name of the shader. If the application does not specify the debug name itself, an auto-generated name matching the PDB file of the shader is provided instead.
summary.div: Note This value is supported by the D3dcompiler_47.dll as available on the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update and its SDK, or later version of the file.

summary.para: The blob part is a test alternate shader.
summary.div: Note This value identifies a test part and is only produced by special compiler versions. Therefore, this part type is typically not present in shaders.

summary.para: The blob part is test compilation details.
summary.div: Note This value identifies a test part and is only produced by special compiler versions. Therefore, this part type is typically not present in shaders.

summary.para: The blob part is test compilation performance.
summary.div: Note This value identifies a test part and is only produced by special compiler versions. Therefore, this part type is typically not present in shaders.

summary.para: The blob part is a test compilation report.
summary.div: Note This value identifies a test part and is only produced by special compiler versions. Therefore, this part type is typically not present in shaders.
Note This value is supported by the D3dcompiler_44.dll or later version of the file.
